Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Plum Grove in 1985...
Had first career hit on 9/29/1985, off Timo Soto (NJ)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/6/1986, off Adolfo Baltasar (BC)...
Traded from Plum Grove to Troy on 7/30/1988 (Going to TRO: 2B K. Tucci. Going to PG: P A. Rotella)...
Won World Championship with Troy in 1989...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (UBA) on 2/6/1991 to a 5-year deal worth $4,700,000 per year...
